name: Coin Purse

pages.text: The $(thing)Coin Purse$() can be a vital tool when playing with multiple $(thing)coin$()-based currencies. It allows you to stack up to 256 $(thing)coins$() in a single inventory slot

To use a $(thing)Coin Purse$(), you have to right-click on it in your inventory while having some $(thing)coins$() selected, akin to the vanilla $(thing)Bundle$(). $(br2) To retrieve $(thing)coins$() from the $(thing)Coin Purse$(), either right-click in your inventory to retrieve up to a stack of the $(thing)coin$() type you last inserted, or use it in-world to completely empty it out onto the ground.
